item.title: Blazor EF Migrations with Multiple Providers
item.description: Blazor Blazor Entity Framework Migrations with Multiple Providers This code demonstrates how to implement multiple database providers in a Blazor application using C#. It allows you to switch between different database providers, such as InMemory, SQLite, and SQL Server, based on the configuration settings. Database Provider: Refers to the type of database being used, such as InMemory, SQLite, or SQL Server. Connection String: A string that contains the necessary information to connect to a specific database.
